attributes.additional_details: Our country has gone to pot, we are over run by people living off benefits when they are more than capable of working, we have dropped in world education rates in numeracy and literature and we have a corrupt set of MP's. I call on the government to sort out this country now. We want laws that actually help our country, don't mess around with same sex marriages, get us more apprenticeships before messing with other moral issues like that please! I want you to concentrate on making our country better by letting us have more say in how our country is run.
